item.title: U.S. added just 73,000 jobs in July and numbers for prior months were revised much lower
item.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 100,000 in July, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

item.title: Switzerland's tariff shock: The 39% U.S. hit no one saw coming
item.description: The duty would be a "devastating" blow to the export-reliant Swiss economy and businesses, analysts say.

item.title: Trump modifies tariff rates ahead of deadline, levies 40% duties on all transshipped goods
item.description: All goods that are considered to have been transshipped to avoid applicable duties will be subject to an additional 40% tariff, according to the White...

item.title: Euro zone inflation holds steady at higher-than-expected 2% in July
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected the figure to hit 1.9%.

item.title: German inflation dips to cooler-than-expected 1.8% in July
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected inflation to ease to 1.9%.
